result.reason: UX design preference about inheritance defaults — maintainer already explained current behavior and workaround; changing defaults would be a breaking change for existing users
result.approach: No action — maintainer already responded with explanation of current design and how to configure default inheritance via the root Connections node

attempts.raw_output:
This is a UX/design improvement request, not a bug. The issue asks for two things:

1. Show all inheritable properties on folder (container) nodes, even for properties that don't apply to containers directly
2. Change the default so new connections inherit everything from parent by default

The maintainers already responded explaining the current behavior and how to configure defaults. This is labeled "Improvement required" but is essentially a design preference/enhancement request with significant scope (changing default inheritance behavior would be a breaking change for existing users).
